pr_title: Consistent use of DTOs in Jira/Bitbucket/BambooService and improved test coverage in BitbucketService

timeline.message: mock creating new lti user if needed

extract new UrlService to remove duplicated code

also add ProgrammingExerciseTestService based on delegation to align Bitbucket+Bamboo with Gitlab+Jenkins tests and to avoid duplicated code in those
remove duplicated code for kotlin + java test by using parameterized tests

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into chore/url-service-test-improvements

# Conflicts:
#	src/test/java/de/tum/in/www1/artemis/programmingexercise/ProgrammingExerciseGitlabJenkinsIntegrationTest.java
Create Service for testing of incoming programming exercise results
set min coverage for server tests to 80%
Fix translation in programming ex detail view
Merge branch 'chore/url-service-test-improvements' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into chore/url-service-test-improvements
add testcase for Conflict in copyRepository

timeline.bodyText: we should return List<BitbucketWebHookDTO> here and simply return response.getBody().getSearchResults() or List.of()
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: please avoid String.format and use normal string concatenation
timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText:
please avoid String.format and use normal string concatenation
check out other toString() methods, you can actually generate those automatically in IntelliJ

timeline.bodyText: The codacy point here I believe is valid. If you make this method abstract you can ensure that it is not called accidentally while it is not implemented.
timeline.author: anditurdiu

replies.bodyText: This is intentional. This is a requirement by the interface that is implemented. This method has to be implemented later on, when we implement the tests for Jenkins
replies.author: krusche
